name: Abenity
tag_list: web-applications, employee-discount-programs, member-discount-programs, hr-solutions, human-resource-management-software, employee-discounts, hr-benefits
overview:
Abenity offers employee discount programs and member discount programs for leading companies and associations.

Abenity enables companies to increase their perks and benefits through a privately branded discount program, packed with discount offers and features to give them complete control, savings and flexibility. Members will enjoy over 100,000 local and national discounts, and savings in excess of $4,500.

Todayâ€™s leading employers are looking to employee discount programs as a new and innovative way to maximize the impact of their benefits package. However, creating and managing a comprehensive employee perks program can be challenging without the help of an online human resource management solution like Abenity.

Many organizations attempt to create their own discount programs internally but lack the technical resources and vendor relationships they need to continually grow and sustain their program. Abenityâ€™s online system allows companies of all sizes to offer their employees access to thousands of discounts as a benefit within an environment that is privately branded for their company.

Today, Abenity serves over 100 employers, membership groups, and alumni associations by providing them with an online solution where they can integrate an unlimited number of their existing discounts with the more than 100,000 discounts that Abenity has to offer.

Abenityâ€™s member and employee discounts are available across 2,300 U.S. cities and may be redeemed in store, with printable and mobile coupons, online and by phone.
